biography: Smail Zabata Laissaoui known under the pseudonym of "Zabata", is an Algerian actor of cinema, television and theater from Berrouaghia in Algeria. A figure of popular Algerian cinema, he is particularly known for his role as “The Apprentice” in “Les Vacances de l’Apprenti” alongside Yahia Benmabrouk.
name: Smail "Zabata" Laissaoui
